events.name: Year 11 Parents Evening
events.information: We would like to invite you to attend our Parentsâ€™ Evening on Wednesday 1st November 2017. This is a good opportunity to have a conversation with us in the build up to the final GCSE exams. A map can be located on the school website to help you plan your appointments.

events.name: Year 10 Gifted & Talented Evening
events.information: What pupils and parents can be doing now to gain that competitive edge when applying to university. At 7.30pm there will be a half an hour presentation on "Supporting your Gifted & Talented Child"
